introduction: Born in Los Angeles, Joshua began acting at age seven, when he began performing weekly in a local comedy ensemble. Joshua's credits include FOX's comedy pilot "Winning Ugly", "The Goldbergs" (ABC), "Modern Family" (ABC), "Sam and Cat" (Nickelodeon), "Henry Danger" (Nickelodeon), and Bizaardvark (Disney). This Fall, Joshua will be appearing on the new Amazon Series "The Romanoffs," directed by Academy Award winning director, Matthew Weiner. Joshua is also a series regular on "Richie Rich" (Netflix), as well as the voice of "Prince Desmond" on Disney Jr.'s cartoon series "Sofia The First." Off camera, Joshua is a classically trained, award-winning pianist. His musical talents have enabled him to perform at the prestigious Carnegie Hall in New York City, as well as perform as a piano soloist with The Thousand Oaks Philharmonic. In addition to acting and music, Joshua is a Junior Member of Hollywood's world famous "Magic Castle." He loves performing magic to entertain audiences of all ages. It is his hope to bring happiness to others, as well as make a positive difference in the world through his performances both on and off the screen.
